content: the top of the loose knit triangle the one you worked first p2tog these stitches being the stitch you have just picked up and the first stitch on your needle 3 again use the lh dpn to pick up the stitch next to the one you previously picked up and purled together on the horizontal i-cord p2tog 4 bobble 1 st slip the first stitch on your rh needle over the one you have just purled to bind it off 5 use the lh dpn to pick up a third stitch from the horizontal i-cord next to the one you purled in step 3 p2tog 6 bobble these last 2 stitches using the method as described in step 4 © anouskaknits 2025 blueberry bandana august 2025 6 seaming + finishing thread the ends through the center of the i-cord for at least 5 cm note see video 6 for a demonstration to weave them in and then wet block your garment to even out the sts i d so love to see your finished knits if you share be sure to tag me @anouskaknits #anouskaknits #blueberrybandana where else to find me www anouskaknits com https //www ravelry com/people/anouskaknits © anouskaknits 2025 blueberry bandana august 2025 7
